{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = ASUS USB-AC54 B1.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1300 Dual Band Wi-Fi USB 3.1 Adapter |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/USB-AC57/ |sp = |dl = https://www.asus.com/Networking/USB-AC57/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_USB-AC57 |wikipedia = |brand = ASUS |model = USB-AC57 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/30/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_USB-AC57 |sernum = 90IGO3K0-BC0G10 |wlclass = AC1300 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.1 (Gen 1) |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0b05 |device_id = 1841 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MSQ-USBACRU00 |icid = 4324A-USBACRU00 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 10:7B:44, 04:92:26 |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BU; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = 400 |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu rtl8822bu] |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/07/2018 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *'''Instantly upgrade''' - PC or laptop to Dual Band AC1300 Wi-Fi (867+400 Mbps). *'''256QAM technology''' - Increases 2.4 GHz data rate from 300Mbps to 400Mbps. *'''USB 3.1 (Gen 1) MU-MIMO Wi-Fi adapter''' - 10x faster USB interface for smooth Wi-Fi and when multiple MU-MIMO compatible devices are connected. *'''Perfect for streaming and gaming''' - Dual band antenna design enables PC/laptop to connect with 5GHz band for smooth 4K UHD streaming and low latency gaming. ==Notes== ===Drivers=== *[https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu/commit/6e47770e4783e486708de1b4fbcd370fe0fbff48 ''jeremyb31/rtl8822bu'' on '''GitHub'''] 
 Bus 003 Device 010: ID 0b05:1841 ASUSTek Computer, Inc.
